entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
